website_summaries.verdict: With a beautiful natural look and excellent soap-saving capabilities, this set of 2 wooden soap dishes delivers unbeatable value.
pros: Individual wood ridges offer excellent drainage and work especially well for soft beauty bars and handmade soaps
Concave bed keeps soap from sliding
Charming look with an earthy yet contemporary appeal
cons: Larger soap bars may not fit perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Summary
customer_reviews.text: pretty good one and help me to be a delicate one
customer_reviews.author: Zhe Li

customer_reviews.title: Simple and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad to go along with the soap I was buying for him on Father’s Day. This soap dish actually came in a lot faster than I thought hints that I live in the USA and the box says “made in China”. The packaging is super cute and very neat. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Charell Walter

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought them for all natural soaps they fit right on the windowsill. Made in China and made of wood very light too...
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: It's a sturdy and nice wooden soap tray. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Paula F.

customer_reviews.title: Simple soap dish that drains
customer_reviews.text: This is a great soap dish. It lets the excess water drain away to save soap and this one is well designed. It also helps save soap and looks good in my bathroom. Super easy to keep clean. Overall, I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paulgu

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice wooden holders for soap. The quality is good and they look great. I was looking for something natural and those two are the best choice for this price. They are washable and easy to clean. I like how they fit my bathroom interior. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina Vakhromeeva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They are light but stay in place which is what I was worried about. Bamboo//Asian feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because I saw mixed reviews, but the product I received was good quality. The wood looks nice and you can't see the nails at all. I bought them because I'm switching to natural bar soap instead of liquid soap. I'm using one in the bathroom for bar soap and one in the kitchen for our sponge. They look great and I love how the slats provide drainage to prevent water from pooling.
customer_reviews.author: BirdingGirl

customer_reviews.title: They’re cute!
customer_reviews.text: We have these in our shower so they get wet daily. They fit perfectly into a niche we had installed when we had our bathroom remodeled. They’re doing just fine! I love that they have slots that allow the water to run through so it doesn’t settle, and they’re cuter than the other standard shower soap dishes that I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Elms

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a few weeks and are really enjoying them. They live in the shower so they are being exposed to water everyday and are holding up nicely so far. Great value for the soap holders. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Warning!  Not as described!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it zero stars I would. Came wrapped in layers of plastic. Not an environmentally friendly choice. They reek of chemicals, I had to put them outside. Can’t be a healthy way to hold soap that you apply to your body. They are cheaply made and glued together, can’t see how they will last for any length of time as a soap holder. Don’t waste your money or time on these!
customer_reviews.author: ESL teacher

customer_reviews.title: Functionally Sound
customer_reviews.text: This item is functionally Awsome! I have bought a similar product that has a flat bottom on Amazon that is starting to absorb water into the wood. This open bottom design increases the life of the bar of soap. Over time I am sure the Glued columns will break and ill have to buy another set, but you get 2 here for the price of 1 of the other products I am describing. I think this is a great functional item to consider purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice dark soap dish for African Black Soap
customer_reviews.text: Nice dark wood color. Really like these for our African black soap. Keeps me from having to clean the soap dish b/c of the brown coloring of the soap. The slats also allow the soap to dry thoroughly, rather than sit in a pool of water - which makes the soap not last long! The 3 pack makes it nice to put in the kitchen, bath and have an extra one. I only left one star off b/c 1 chipped pretty quickly. It's not very noticeable to anyone else, but I see it every time!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hartman

customer_reviews.title: I like these soap dishes.
customer_reviews.text: I like these wooden soap dishes for use in the shower. They are easy to clean and the soap is well drained. The only issue I have with them is that the end pieces tend to come apart from the wood. They are hard to get back together so that they will stay. Someone who is a better "fix-it" than I am should have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiagirl34

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This product seems cheaply made. I guess you get what you pay for. It looks nice enough but I definitely wouldn’t put it in the shower. I haven’t been using it for long but I don’t think it will hold up. Light weight and feels fragile. The glue holding it together is visible.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I like how they look!
customer_reviews.text: These things perform a pretty basic function, so that'd be pretty difficult to screw up. But before I had these, I would just my bar of soap down on my sink, or somewhere in my shower. Now they have a dedicated spot, on these cool looking wood things. I think they're made out of some particle board thing, and painted to look like wood, or something. But I like them, and thought they were worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: These are WAY better than those ugly and cheesy plastic or rubber holders. So far, these have held up extremely well. I have gone through several bars of soap on these things and after being exposed to soap, water, and everyday usage, they still look new. Not sure how long they will last, but when they finally give, I will buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkbait

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathroom and kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition. Using one in the shower for body/hair soap bars, and one at the kitchen sink for dish soap bars. Working great at both uses. Easy to clean. Would be better if they came in less plastic packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The glue used to make these is has run out of all the joints and was just covered by the stain. All the glue areas are turning white with exposure to water and soap. The quality of wood is bad also and really shouldn't be used in this application, mine was actually broken at a glue joint so I submitted for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Choadism

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy to clean, and does the job
customer_reviews.text: We decided to switch from liquid soap to bar soap, and we wanted something simple, easy to clean, and does not collect water. This product meets our overall needs. Even a larger wet soap would stay on the tray. The only thing is that the edge of the oval shape kind of cuts into a larger soap, but it is not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: zimin huang

customer_reviews.title: Company never replied to 2 complaints
customer_reviews.text: I like the soap dishes but one of them had a big split in the wood. I contacted the company twice and they never responded. I saw this was a problem that other consumers have had. I wanted to send back the one bad one and keep the other two. I was afraid if I ordered all new ones there may be more than one that was bad. Guess I will just toss the one bad one.
customer_reviews.author: LindaB

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are held together with globs of glue. The glue is very evident and very white. I tried cleaning these and they felt like they were going to fall apart. These are very flimsy. Not a great buy. They look okay at a distance... A long distance.
customer_reviews.author: Dagoberto Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I’ve finally made the switch from body wash in plastic bottles to much better for you and the environment bar soap. I was pleasantly surprised when I got these at the quality of wood. Great color. Perfect size to place on my shower soak shelf and a bar of soap.
customer_reviews.author: Faith St John

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I was using those little plastic things with the teeth to hold my soap. Fell on shower floor frequently. These are wonderful. Nice looking, easy to clean and the soap doesn't fall on the floor. Great price. You won't be sorry to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Tennies

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use handmade soaps throughout my house, and fell in love with these holders, I returned to buy some more. I now have these next to every sink in the house, i’ve even bought some for friends. I like how it is contoured, so the soap doesn’t stick to a flat surface. They are also very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good soap holder
customer_reviews.text: These are great and easy to clean. I soaked mine for about 10 min then when I scrubbed it, a piece broke off. They seemed to be glued together. They are great for price but they will not last forever. I bought more of course.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for every day use
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of these soap holders. However they started to soften and sliver. Will probably go back to ceramic or plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look I think if you clean it often the soap won't build up so much on the wood I don't like how the soapy water goes onto the counter, but to b expected, but love the look and simplicity of the product so it's a trade off!
customer_reviews.author: knightdogs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and long-lasting color
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! They are pretty lightweight (which I like) and the perfect size for any bar of soap I have tried. I also really like that the color has not worn off as I have cleaned them. Soap residue tends to get stuck on them, but it rinses off easily and doesn't cause any damage to the color in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb and Mykenna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic !!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these, best soap holders I’ve found so far by far. I use bar soap for body wash, shampoo, and conditioner and they work fantastically especially because they let water drain through. My whole family uses snd loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Lester

customer_reviews.title: Great little soap bar holder
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these soap dishes many times and love them. Easy to clean makes the soap dry properly without cracking the soap bar. Big enough for the large soap bars and makes the shower look nice inside
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and serves it's purpose well. But don't expect a well built product. One of mine arrived with the end cross section loose and bent due to pitting in the wood. They're held together with tacks and glue, which is fine. But the construction is sloppy and there's dried glue all over every joint underneath. They're not terrible, I might even buy them again. But I don't expect them to last long enough to pass down to the grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Like the look but...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of this two pack of soap dishes, but unfortunately as you can see in the picture the product didn’t hold up well. I’ve only had theses little over a week and the end came unglued. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: smile-shopper

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality not too heavy or light, easy to clean keeps bar of soap less mushy. Of course this needs to be placed somewhere that dripping can occur as there is no bottom to catch water. Nice look
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Really cute little soap dish. I call it my soap deck because that's what it literally looks like. My soap stays clean and dry and not mushy like traditional soap dishes. Super sleek and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Looks chintzy
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice until it gets wet then you can see the glue that is holding it together. Only been a few days so don't know how it will hold up, and how the soap will hold up. Regardless, I would't purchase them again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mayzin1

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to clean and keep bar soap from getting gross. One of those things you don’t realize how great it is to have once you have it.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and but challenging to clean
customer_reviews.text: These soap holders have a really nice look and hold the soap well. However if you don’t clean them everyday (Or every 2-3 days) removing the soap build-up is really frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: New York

customer_reviews.title: Nice lil' soap holders!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased some home-made soaps from the local market but they sat next to my sink and started withering away...I saw these soap dishes online and knew it would be perfect. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love these soap holders. I’ve had mine for 4 years now and they are still in good shape. Easy to clean if you do it on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Laquita Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for holding my shampoo and conditioner bars! I also love the look of them.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great in the bathroom. I docked a star because they get grimy a bit easily. However, they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Boo plastic packaging
customer_reviews.text: I always take a star off for plastic packaging. These were individually wrapped in plastic- so wasteful & unnecessary. I bought these because I’m using bar soap to reduce my plastic waste, so it’s annoying when these arrive in......plastic. They do their job & hold the soap. No complaints besides the previously mentioned
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good structure
customer_reviews.text: Use these in our camper shower. Light weight. Easy to clean. A great soap saver and it fits perfectly in the ledge of the shower. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Louise A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.  Nice gift also.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and they seem to be durable - for holding soap. I don’t know that they will really “come clean” as they are wood, but I haven’t worried about it - because it is soap and it isn’t really in need of cleaning at this point. Great deal for the price. Even a nice gift with handmade or locallly made soaps.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L

customer_reviews.title: Functional art
customer_reviews.text: Durability is yet to be seen ..ive only had them a few days. I use them for soap dishes ....makes my soap last longer and keeps it from becoming a glob of slime. Love how they look !
customer_reviews.author: sshell

customer_reviews.title: No bottom to collect runoff
customer_reviews.text: These are a good value for the money, but be aware that there is no bottom to catch the soap/water runoff from your bar of soap. So, if you place this next to the sink, it'll leak out. You may need to buy an additional piece or put a washrag underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more melted soap
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd have bought these a long time ago. I hate when the soap dwindles down and gets real thin and just melts right into the soap dish. Now the soap stays dry and leaves no sudsy mess or buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Villagomez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical
customer_reviews.text: Needed new soap holders and these work great! Fairly easy to clean and look really nice
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Very cool looking!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after an expensive bar of soap got stuck on the side of my tub. I love how they look and the fact that they can accommodate a good sized bar of soap. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking,  but don't expect the dark color to last.  Works well to hold soap and let it dry out.
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind the lighter color showing through after a few months, so I like these! Will wear with lighter wood color underneath. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel nice. Also bought this awhile ago and they're still nearly perfect. They are light but still hold their quality. Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.author: CarlitoJr

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic and works wonderfully well!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was wanting! We use soap a friend of mine makes, and the “soap shelf” in our shower doesn’t have enough depth for draining. Our lovely soap was melting away! These are really pretty soap dishes that really work. They hold the bars up and allow the water to drain away. Very attractive and functional!
customer_reviews.author: wildjoy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! First I ordered 4 (2 boxes), then ordered 4 more. I use them for my Dial antibacterial soap since you can't get your hands on liquid soap these days. And use them in my shower for my specialty soaps.
customer_reviews.author: TamiLee1975

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it for long and it is falling apart. The glue is not holding. Definitely not good for anything that is exposed to water. Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get these. They started falling apart once they got saturated with water. The tiny nails came right out of place. Had to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: On time, as expected, wrapped in plastic
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had them long enough to tell you much. Perhaps Amazon prompts us to reviw items a little too soon. Came on time, as expeceted. However, for those of you who bought this to avoid plastic (as I did), it DOES come wrapped in plastic. You'll still be avoiding all those bottles of hand soap, but just saying because I'm trying to increase awareness. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Look great and work well as a soap holder. Unfortunately, after having them for several months small pieces of wood are starting to peel off when the soap gets stuck (not unexpected, more an FYI).
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my handmade soaps. Nothing worse for soaps then sitting in a puddle of water and wasting away. These keep the soaps elevated and lasting longer. Well made and very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalPommieTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to dish
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I bought these. The grates allow the water to drip off the soap without staying in a soap dish. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Soap Dish
customer_reviews.text: A lovely piece to place my hand made soaps (that I purchased) on for drying purposes. I place them around the house and enjoy the pleasant scent while they dry (the water evaporates).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough, look just fine
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. They have held up just fine after several weeks in the shower and actually help the soap bars last longer. They're of serviceable quality and not ugly but not super fancy looking either. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Longer lasting soap for sure, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Started using higher quality soap from various places and needed a soap saving holder. These really work well, feels like my soap lasts twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: JShel

customer_reviews.title: Soap dishes
customer_reviews.text: Love these soap dishes. So far they are holding up well. There isn't any soap residue build up. That was important for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Stadnik

customer_reviews.title: It is growing green and white mold!?
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know what to think about this. My soap dish in my bathtub area is growing green and white mold! How disappointing. It should be able to exist in moist conditions. I have only had this soap dish for about about a week. Waste of $10.
customer_reviews.author: sgbroussard

customer_reviews.title: Rustic look for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I like the rustic look that the wood adds to my bathroom. They are nice, decorative soap holders and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katarina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for myself and one for my mom. It looks so nice in our shower and it is so easy to clean. I recommend this product for the price. I try to avoid plastic as much as possible and glass in the shower makes me nervous, so I highly recommend this product to someone who is looking for something more eco friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these myself and bought them for my relatives as a gift to accompany some soap selections. Soap dries very quickly. I even take these with me when I travel so I can enjoy my favorite soaps.
customer_reviews.author: KathiB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bars
customer_reviews.text: Use these for bar soap and bar shampoo. Iheart nature soaps are what I am using. Helps to keep the bars lasting longer and not dissolving quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel

customer_reviews.title: Cute and does the job
customer_reviews.text: We like these type of soap holders in that air circulates and the soap doesn't just mush into the dish. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Love these little soap holders
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these soap holders. Have one in the shower, one at the kitchen sink, one at the mudroom sink - great to hold soap & scrubbers. Hold up very well and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: C B Huebner

customer_reviews.title: Does not stain!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. Most wooden things that have water on tend to stain in white tubs and sinks. These have yet to do so in the past year or so. I very much love them and am going to invest in more in the bathrooms around my home, and even my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: EllieChrome

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, 2 per pack!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, especially getting two for the price. Helps keep my expensive soap dry between showers so it'll last longer.
customer_reviews.author: MOONRUNNER

customer_reviews.title: Functional and looks good
customer_reviews.text: These look great! They keep the counter clean and the soap dries much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: They seem sturdy enough for long time usage, easy enough to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight feels cheap. Horrible glue job you can see it dried and spilt over on each slate. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: but is very cheaply made and won’t hold a regular size bar of soap.
customer_reviews.author: Pro Makeup Artist4Life

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product! One of the reason I prefer wood ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product ! One of the reason I prefer wood products is because wood stores carbon long after they have been harversted !
customer_reviews.author: Deltium

customer_reviews.title: Cool design!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish design and the quality of the product is pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my homemade soap. They are made well. I’ve purchased them several times because I give them as gifts with my soaps.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these and love them! I always hated the plastic soap holders ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched to natural bar soap and shampoo bars, and I needed something to hold them all. Ordered these and love them! I always hated the plastic soap holders but these provide nice drainage and you just can't go wrong with wood.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Becker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect touch to any bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Very luxurious! Perfect touch to my bathroom. Do not pass these up!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Campbell

customer_reviews.text: A little too expensive. You can see too much glue there
customer_reviews.author: milos

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad soap holder
customer_reviews.text: I feared this set would be to large when I bought them. The soap holder is like perfect size for my the bars of soap I buy.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.S

customer_reviews.title: very light and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and work great to keep soap dry and elevated.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hale

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight wood keeps it from scratching surfaces. Combined with the gentle color helps accent any bar of soap.
customer_reviews.author: Softie

customer_reviews.title: soap dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This will work fine for soap in our new tile shower. Water runs straight through but is very lightweight and easy to knock off shelf. Overall happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great and keep soap dry
customer_reviews.text: These are great at keeping my handmade soaps dry. Soap lasts so much longer this way!
customer_reviews.author: Dana S. Helmuth

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t mind my sad looking soap! I bought two of these and love them. They really don’t make any mess and I only clean when I change the soap.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Silveria

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something simply to hold my soap, but also wanted something cute that matches my bathroom. My husband noticed them right away and said they looked nice. They seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS
customer_reviews.text: I love them, they are easy to clean and so far they are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ColombianGandhi

customer_reviews.title: Attractive soap holders
customer_reviews.text: I like the way these look and they hold my soap well. That's all I know at this point. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: PA female

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: Get this for your bars of soap. We all know how hard it is to find antibacterial soap in the bottled liquid form, so I bought these to hold my bars of soap and they are easy to clean and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Leo Zertuche

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good and Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This soap holder is great. Good finish, not too heavy and not too large. Soap is easy to remove from dish. Drains really well so far, too. No soap buildup as with my previous ceramic soap dish.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Keeping clean
customer_reviews.text: Love the simplicity of the soap dish. Clean and classic.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy G

customer_reviews.title: acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Quality could be better, I will buy another soap case next time
customer_reviews.author: Askhat Beygenov

customer_reviews.title: A good decision.
customer_reviews.text: Just recently got into natural soaps and these are a must have. After a couple of months of use I haven't seen any issues. The groove is a little deeper than I'd like, but still a good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: StrifeHiraeth

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I only received one, but the seller was kind enough to send me another one or refund me for the half. But the soap case is really beautiful. I was getting tired of plastic cases as the soap just sticks to the plastic ruining my soaps, but this one enables ventilation that properly dries off my soap. Loving it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Shruti Priya

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These work great! They keep my soaps from melting from sitting in water. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nolabookqueen

customer_reviews.title: Cute but weird smell?
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but they have a bad odor upon first opening. They seem fine now after they've been out a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ka

product_meta.title: Magift 2 Piece Home Bathroom Wooden Soap Case Holder, Sink Deck Bathtub Shower Dish, Rectangular, Hand Craft, Natural Wooden Holder for Sponges, Scrubber
product_meta.description:
Size:2 pack soap dishSpecifications:
Size: 4.25in*3.14in*0.87in

1.Hand Made By Craftsmen

3.Unlike many soap holders, ours is coated with a non-toxic finish that is odor-free, non-yellowing, and with zero volatile organic compounds.

5.Modern, Contemporary Design Makes A Perfect Gift.
6.This soap dish will fit in with any decor in any room of your house, and is ideal as a gift for the most discerning of friends.
7.Take Care Of Your Handmade Soap The Soap Club Way With Our All-Natural Handmade Beechwood Soap Dish.
How to Use: 
Natural soap needs to drain and dry if you want to preserve it correctly, and that's where our Soap Club soap dish comes in, with its large curved slats that help that excess water run off, while at the same time allowing it to be well ventilated.
Saving Your Soap Is As Easy As Step 1-2-3
1. Remove your soap from a wet or moist area.
2. Place the soap on the surface of our soap tray, so that it can drain thoroughly.
3. Ensure the soap dish is in a cool, dry area.
